thread.title: Buhari Is Healthy, No Cause For Alarm – Saraki
thread.title_full: Buhari Is Healthy, No Cause For Alarm – Saraki

author: oluchi
title: Buhari Is Healthy, No Cause For Alarm – Saraki
text:
Buhari Is Healthy, No Cause For Alarm – Saraki   16, 2017 
The Senate President, Dr Bukola Saraki has assured that there is no cause for alarm on the health status of President Buhari as he is healthy. 
In a press statement signed and issued on Wednesday night, Dr Saraki says himself, the Speaker of the House of Representatives Yakubu Dogara and the Senate Leader Ahmed Lawan paid a visit to President Buhari at the Abuja House in London. 
He said they were delighted to see that President Buhari is doing well, cheerful and in good spirit. 
Dr Saraki noted that the President’s absence and imminent return shows that there is no vacuum in government and all organs of government are fulfilling their mandate. 
President Buhari had written to the National Assembly informing lawmakers of his decision to extend his vacation, to attend to some health challenges. 
However, President Buhari did not specify how long he would be away. More on Headlines
